release.change: Fixed touch feedback color for pre-lolipop to a more decent transparent grey
More I18N fixes and added french
Fixes on package details dialogs (color, long labels)
A first attempt to right-to-left languages with arabic
Added details about API stats to dumpfile
Fixed battery graph if battery is 100% over the whole time
Replaced holo touch feedback with material design ripple effect
Fixed light overflow menu in dark theme
More language fixes and new translations
Fixed battery graph always showing the same values
Better scaling and font size for gauges
Primary dark color for notification bar on Lolipop
System app dialog now links to the recovery ZIPs to be used as workaround
Added fix for native alarms on Lolipop. Experimental, may cause slow calls
Fixed white-on-white theme when calling prefs after fresh install
Added preferences to change font-size and icon-size
Fixed Alarms details dialog showing infinite/Hr.
Show SELinux Policy on System App dialog and Dumpfile
Introduced settings to force the use of the API for Alarms and Kernel Wakelocks
Added battery from/to % back to screen (optionally)
Notification area should be invisible by default
Ditched cards for a better use of the real estate
A first shot at german I18N
An attempt to work around BATTERY_INFO service not being reachable on some devices
Surface errors that may occur while processing stats
Work around kernel wakelock file not being accessible if SELinux is not permissive
Automatically fall back to API mode for alarms if SELinux is not permissive
Fixed infinite values of gauges in Alarms
Fixed missing white heading in RAW stats
Fixed gauges in raw stats always shown 100%
Begun externalization of strings for translation
Added advanced settings to avoid using dumpsys for alarms (bypasses the need for permissive SELinux)
Refactored time and timespan calculations: should avoid any rounding error
Added ability to save dumpfiles in JSON format from tasker plugin
